page.title: 09GAMES WE PLAY
page.content: Often we play on our bikes and roller boots. We play in the play park. We play at Volley ball, French cricket Cricket, Football, Tennis and other Ball games in our garden. We play on the bars at Claire's house.Sometimes the boys fight.We play with our animals. We play Hide and Seek and Block. We go around in groups. We play Bad eggs and Stando. At school we play Unihoc, Netball, Rugby,Sevens, and Corner to Corner. We play Letters with one person at one end and some people at the other end. The person who is on calls out letters e.g.E. If you have it in your name twice you move forward two steps. We play May I, Horse and Pony games, Murder in the Dark and Werewolfs we have lots of good fun.
